short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension with lenny faces

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension which will bring all your lenny friends to your clipboard, click on extension and simply type things like "look, awesome, middle finger"... then click on that and Boom!!, Ctrl + V to use that lenny
